author: rjung
msg: the revision number, but only if release
script is used. Keyword substitution doesn't
work, because svn doesn't allow to retrieve
the revision number without any decoration.
The new JK_FULL_EXPOSED_VERSION is used during
init/startup/shutdown logging, not for the short

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-452, GERONIMO-5648, GERONIMO-5649 add retry logic for rollback, add logic for commit and rollback response to XAER_RMFAIL, and set tx timeout on XAResource.  Port from rev 1023970 in 2.2 branch

author: gbrown
msg: Ensure that TextArea has a valid default value; make TextAreaSkin more robust in handling empty paragraph content.
